name: Cousins Properties Incorporated
description: Cousins Properties Incorporated is a leading real estate investment trust (REIT) focused on the development, acquisition, and management of office properties in high-growth markets. Founded in 1958 and headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, the company has established a strong reputation for its expertise in creating and managing premier office spaces. Cousins Properties primarily operates in key urban areas across the Southeastern United States, including Atlanta, Charlotte, and Austin, leveraging demographic and economic trends to identify growth opportunities. The company is committed to sustainable development practices, incorporating energy-efficient systems and environmentally responsible building materials into its projects. With a diverse portfolio of high-quality assets, Cousins Properties aims to deliver exceptional returns to its shareholders while enhancing the communities in which it operates. The company’s strategic focus on urban infill locations and mixed-use developments positions it well to capitalize on the ongoing trend of urbanization and the demand for modern workspaces. Additionally, Cousins Properties is dedicated to maintaining strong relationships with tenants and stakeholders, ensuring high occupancy rates and tenant satisfaction through responsive management and innovative property solutions.

seo.meta_title: Cousins Properties Incorporated | Leading Real Estate Investment Trust
seo.meta_description: Explore Cousins Properties Incorporated, a top REIT focused on high-quality office properties in growth markets. Discover our commitment to sustainability and tenant satisfaction.

faq.question: What type of properties does Cousins Properties focus on?
faq.answer: Cousins Properties primarily focuses on Class A office spaces and mixed-use developments.

faq.question: Where is Cousins Properties headquartered?
faq.answer: Cousins Properties is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Cousins Properties?
faq.answer: Colin Connolly is the CEO of Cousins Properties Incorporated.
